history.proof: unfold ball_norm. destruct e as [eps He]. qsimpl. scongruence use: norm_zero, @minus_eq_zero unfold: AbelianGroup.sort, Rgt, norm, NormedModule.AbelianGroup.

exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K x : V eps : R He : 0 < eps Unable to unify "0 < eps" with "norm (minus x x) < eps".

original: unfold ball_norm. unfold ball. unfold locally. unfold ball_norm in e. destruct e as [eps He]. exists eps. intros y. apply He. unfold ball. auto.
